sql: SELECT MIN(a1.name) AS writer_pseudo_name, MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM aka_name AS a1, cast_info AS ci, company_name AS cn, movie_companies AS mc, name AS n1, role_type AS rt, title AS t WHERE cn.country_code ='[us]' AND rt.role ='writer' AND a1.person_id = n1.id AND n1.id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = t.id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.company_id = cn.id AND ci.role_id = rt.id AND a1.person_id = ci.person_id AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(t mc cn a1 rt ci n1)
 HashJoin(a1 rt ci n1)
 HashJoin(a1 rt ci)
 HashJoin(rt ci)
 MergeJoin(t mc cn)
 MergeJoin(t mc)
 SeqScan(t)
 SeqScan(mc)
 IndexScan(cn)
 TidScan(a1)
 BitmapScan(rt)
 BitmapScan(ci)
 BitmapScan(n1)
 Leading((((t mc) cn) ((a1 (rt ci)) n1))) */
